description: This file defines a Spring component class `KeycloakManager` that manages interactions with Keycloak, specifically retrieving a `RealmResource` instance based on configured properties.

classes.name: KeycloakManager
classes.description: A Spring component managing Keycloak realm resources, utilizing injected properties to establish Keycloak connections.

methods.name: getKeyCloakInstanceWithRealm
methods.description: Returns a Keycloak RealmResource instance based on configured realm information.
